docs.snippet: Fidelity Investments has slashed its estimated valuation of technology companies Cloudera and Dropbox, a report on Wednesday showed, in the latest indication of concern over the high prices of startups that have raised many millions from private i...
docs.lead_paragraph: Fidelity Investments has slashed its estimated valuation of technology companies Cloudera and Dropbox, a report on Wednesday showed, in the latest indication of concern over the high prices of startups that have raised many millions from private investors, but delayed going public.

headline.main: Fidelity Marks Down Stake in Pre-IPO Startups Cloudera, Dropbox
headline.print_headline: Fidelity Marks Down Stake in Pre-IPO Startups Cloudera, Dropbox
